content: In 2008, the New Pangea National Congress passed the "New Atomica" bill, successfully reducing the use of fossil fuels by 97.4% by 2015. Since then, the country's main source of energy has been nuclear energy from Atomica Industries, raising safety concerns. In 2014, the Congress passed the "Green Pangea" bill mandating recycling bins and education on recycling waste in both public and private schools.
